titles.title: O for a Closer Walk with God

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O for a closer walk with God, a calm and heav'nly frame, a light to shine upon the road that leads me to the Lamb!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Where is the blessedness I knew when first I sought the Lord? Where is the soul-refreshing view of Jesus and His Word?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: What peaceful hours I once enjoyed! How sweet their mem'ry still! But they have left an aching void the world can never fill.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Return, O holy Dove, return, sweet messenger of rest; I hate the sins that made Thee mourn, and drove Thee from my breast.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: The dearest idol I have known, whate'er that idol be, help me to tear it from Thy throne and worship only Thee.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: So shall my walk be close with God, calm and serene my frame; so purer light shall mark the road that leads me to the Lamb.
